requirements.description: Customers with services/apps directed to children are subject to COPPA.

type.summary: Compliance with Children's Online Privacy Protection Act

requirements.description: Customers are not allowed to share personal identifiers with partners of Adjust or other third parties.

type.summary: Prohibition on sharing personal identifiers with third parties

requirements.description: Personal identifiers include IP addresses, IDFA, IDFV, Android ID, Google Play Advertising ID, Google Play Store Referrer, Windows Hardware ID, Windows NetworkID, Windows Phone Device ID, and UUIDs.
These identifiers are potentially data collected within the services.
For more information on COPPA's definition of services directed to children and requirements, see the provided link.
